response.overview: Vera lives in a small town, works as a cashier in a bank and brings up her seven-year-old daughter Dasha alone, whom she has been afraid of losing since birth. At the age of three, Vera herself got lost at the train station and ended up in an orphanage. To this day, Vera does not give up trying to find her mother. Unexpectedly, Marina's mother finds Faith on her own. The long-awaited reunion makes a woman incredibly happy. But everything changes when Vera's first love, Andrey, arrives in the city with his fiancee Olesya. Andrey guesses that Dasha is his daughter, and begins to suspect that Vera's mother is not who she pretends to be.
response.title: His Own Strange Daughter
